item.title: Shocking isn't it .....
item.description:
Somewhere there's a guy with a heroin addicted brain worm busy denying this
From the CDC's website: The claim "vaccines do not cause autism" is not an evidence-based claim because studies have not ruled out the possibility that infant vaccines cause autism. Studies supporting a link have been ignored by health authorities. HHS has launched a comprehensive assessment of the causes of autism, including investigations on plausible biologic mechanisms and potential causal links. https://www.cdc.gov/vaccine-safety/about/autism.html

item.description: Like most artists on the internet, we're trapped in a cycle of creating content for free while hoping someone eventually notices we're slowly selling off furniture to buy art supplies. If you've enjoyed our comic enough to read to the end of this sentence, consider supporting us on Patreon. You'll get exclusive content featuring characters making even worse life choices than we do: https://www.patreon.com/warandpeas

item.title: Potato's Daily Dirties
item.description:
more memes. enjoy!
me trying to conserve my mental energy and prepare for the next week. def a avoid the internet and everyone day.
i mean...
best i can do is computer time.
mine is sleeping behind me. such a cutie.
feel like i just posted this one. i download a lot of repeats.
The above image was made by the wonderful CammyJay! They have their own channel in the deviousness discord where they share artwork and sometimes do drawings based on word prompts given by members. its a lot of fun! I has a Deviousness discord server! We do have a hard rule of no politics and/or religion. The discord is a safe space to get away from the bullshit going on. We have a bunch of areas including a SFW area, content creator area, a NSFW area and more! We have gaming fun! We have spontaneous gaming and some ping roles for people to use to get groups together based on US and EU time zones! We have movie nights on Saturdays! So feel free to wander in and say haii! Thank you to everyone who has joined and made it such a unique and special place! Deviousness discord that is 18+: https://discord.gg/deviousness If you have issues with link see dis: https://imgur.com/a/8GUNAz4 Deviousness steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DeviousnessDiscord
artist of work above (aside from my signing potato on it): https://florahv.artstation.com/projects/XnL8P3 I am on dis now and trying to remember to linky over there too for when I post and also post the memes that get removed: https://bsky.app/profile/potatocheesmonk.bsky.social I has a post with links to all my past posts. enjoy: https://imgur.com/a/ZDA2CBe #deliciousness #potato #memes #dailydirties

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @nicilaskin made these plant stakes and I love them. They've made a lot of cool things. Check 'em out.
27 Man Tax: Common
“I have never been especially impressed by the heroics of people convinced that they are about to change the world. I am more awed by those who struggle to make one small difference after another.” - Ellen Goodman I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: Counter-proposal news
item.description: BRUSSELS, Nov 23 (Reuters) - Below is the text of a European counter-proposal to the United States' draft 28-point Ukraine peace plan, seen by Reuters on Sunday. The counter-proposal, drafted by Europe's E3 powers of Britain, France and Germany, takes the U.S. plan as its basis but then goes through it point by point with suggested changes and deletions. The text is as follows: 1. Ukraine's sovereignty to be reconfirmed. 2. There will be a total and complete non-aggression agreement reached between Russia and Ukraine and NATO. All ambiguities from the last 30 years will be resolved. 3. (Point 3 of plan is deleted. A draft of that plan seen by Reuters said: "There will be the expectation that Russia will not invade its neighbours and NATO will not expand further.") 4. After a peace agreement is signed, a dialogue between Russia and NATO will convene to address all security concerns and create a de-escalatory environment to ensure global security and increase the opportunity for connectivity and future economic opportunity. 5. Ukraine will receive robust Security Guarantees 6. Size of Ukraine military to be capped at 800,000 in peacetime. 7. Ukraine joining NATO depends on consensus of NATO members, which does not exist. 8. NATO agrees not to permanently station troops under its command in Ukraine in peacetime. 9. NATO fighter jets will be stationed in Poland 10. US guarantee that mirrors Article 5 a. US to receive compensation for the guarantee b. If Ukraine invades Russia, it forfeits the guarantee c. If Russia invades Ukraine, in addition to a robust coordinated military response, all global sanctions will be restored and any kind of recognition for the new territory and all other benefits from this agreement will be withdrawn. 11. Ukraine is eligible for EU membership and will get short-term preferred market access to Europe while this is being evaluated 12. Robust Global Redevelopment Package for Ukraine including but not limited to: a. Creation of Ukraine Development fund to invest in high growth industries including technology, data centres and Al efforts b. The United States will partner with Ukraine to jointly restore, grow, modernize and operate Ukraine's gas infrastructure, which includes its pipeline and storage facilities c. A joint effort to redevelop areas impacted by the war to restore, redevelop and modernize cities and residential areas d. Infrastructure development e. Mineral and natural resource extraction f. A special financing package will be developed by the World Bank to provide financing to accelerate these efforts. 13. Russia to be progressively re-integrated into the global economy a. Sanction relief will be discussed and agreed upon in phases and on a case-by-case basis. b. The United States will enter into a long-term Economic Cooperation Agreement to pursue mutual development in the areas of energy, natural resources, infrastructure, AI, datacenters, rare earths, joint projects in the Arctic, as well as various other mutually beneficial corporate opportunities. c. Russia to be invited back into the G8 14. Ukraine will be fully reconstructed and compensated financially, including through Russian sovereign assets that will remain frozen until Russia compensates damage to Ukraine. 15. A joint Security taskforce will be established with the participation of US, Ukraine, Russia and the Europeans to promote and enforce all of the provisions of this agreement 16. Russia will legislatively enshrine a non-aggression policy towards Europe and Ukraine 17. The United States and Russia agree to extend nuclear non-proliferation and control treaties, including Fair Start 18. Ukraine agrees to remain a non-nuclear state under the NPT 19. The Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant will be restarted under supervision of the IAEA, and the produced power shall be shared equitably in a 50-50 split between Russia and Ukraine. 20. Ukraine will adopt EU rules on religious tolerance and the protection of linguistic minorities. 21. Territories Ukraine commits not to recover its occupied sovereign territory through military means. Negotiations on territorial swaps will start from the Line of Contact. 22. Once future territorial arrangements have been agreed, both the Russian Federation and Ukraine undertake not to change these arrangements by force. Any security guarantees will not apply if there is a breach of this obligation 23. Russia shall not obstruct Ukraine's use of the Dnieper River for purposes of commercial activities, and agreements will be reached for grain shipments to move freely through the Black Sea 24. A humanitarian committee will be established to resolve open issues: a. All remaining prisoners and bodies will be exchanged on the principle of All for All b. All civilian detainees and hostages will be returned, including children c. There will be a family reunification program d. Provisions will be made to address the suffering of victims from the conflict 25. Ukraine will hold elections as soon as possible after the signing of the peace agreement. 26. Provision will be made to address the suffering of victims of the conflict. 27. This agreement will be legally binding. Its implementation will be monitored and guaranteed by a Board of Peace, chaired by President Donald J. Trump. There will be penalties for violation. 28. Upon all sides agreeing to this memorandum, a ceasefire will be immediately effective upon both parties withdrawing to the agreed upon points for the implementation of the agreement to begin. Ceasefire modalities, including monitoring, will be agreed by both parties under US supervision. Link: https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/full-text-european-counter-proposal-us-ukraine-peace-plan-2025-11-23/ My tl;dr takeaway: both Russia and Ukraine cannot continue the war and are looking for a way out. Realistically Russia just giving up its claims and going home would be a huge win for Russia as much as it would be a win for Ukraine, but Putin won't do that. This deal is much much better than the US/Russia deal for Ukraine. What is most likely to happen is that some sort of deal will get signed, both sides will rearm and prepare, and Putin will break the agreement and restart the war. However, the agreement gives Ukraine the space to make some deals and EU countries time and space to accept that deal. No idea what that will look like, but I anticipate France and Poland will perhaps lead the way in whatever happens on the EU side. ... Ultimately though fuck Putin.
item.dc:creator: ThatOtherGirlYouKnow

item.title: Keanu Reeves Goes Through An Emergency Landing, Shares A Van With Other Passengers Instead Of Private Luxurious Ride
item.description: the 54-year-old actor was on a flight from San Francisco to Los Angeles when the plane made an emergency landing in Bakersfield, California. That’s a nearly two-hour drive from the Burbank Airport. And, according to eye witnesses and online footage, Mr Reeves not only organized everyone into a group, he joined them on the bus ride to their destination and made the most out of it. The flight diverted due to a “mechanical indication” and landed “safely without incident,” according to Freddy Lemmo, a representative for SkyWest, an airline that frequently operates on behalf of other airlines, in this case, United Express. Mr Reeves is shown calmly speaking to an airline representative and leading a discussion with a group of passengers, trying to figure out the most efficient way to get to Burbank. “The people who can unload the bags won’t be here for three hours. The vans will be here in an hour,” he said and proceeded to explain that it would be much easier to leave and worry about luggage later. At that point, they decided that a bus ride to L.A. was the most optimal solution. The actor kept the group entertained by reading out facts about Bakersfield and playing music native to the area. “Its population is about 380,000, making it the 9th most popular city in California, and the 52nd most popular city in the nation,” Reeves was seen reading from his phone The trip finally ended with the group safely getting to L.A., and Mr Reeves was last seen heading into a Carl’s Jr. https://tvovermind.com/keanu-reeves-road-trip-strangers-california/

item.title: The Nazgul and water
item.description:
This is a lore account on why rivers made the Ringwraiths hesitate.
On June 20, in year 3018 of the Third Age, the forces of Sauron temporarily captured the ruins of Osgiliath in Gondor (art by bearcavestudios). Sauron had ordered his nine Ringwraiths to find and claim the One Ring, that was west of the Great River [that ran through Osgiliath]. Thus the Dark Lord forced “the passage of the bridge of Osgiliath, so that the Nazgûl could cross, while testing the strength of Gondor” (Unfinished Tales; III; IV; ii).
On September 20 the Ringwraiths, also known as the Nazgûl, crossed the fords of the river Isen [1], near to Isengard. The next day, or the day after, they passed the ford of the Greyflood [2]. On September 22 they crossed the ford over the Baranduin [3]. The river Baranduin formed most of the eastern and the southern border of the Shire (green).
Four Riders entered the Shire to see if Frodo Baggins, who had the Ring, was still in that large land. In fact he was still leaving and on September 25 Frodo and his friends took the ferry over the Baranduin in the western part of the Shire. Once across the Baranduin the companions spotted a crawling, dark figure searching the dock that they had left behind. This was Khamûl, and it is worth to note that Khamûl is the only of the Nazgûl we know by name (art by Roger Garland).
On their way to Rivendell the hobbits and their Ranger guide Aragorn met the Elf lord Glorfindel. October 20 the Nazgûl attacked them at the ford of the river Bruinen, near Rivendell. Glorfindel put Frodo on his horse and sent him off ahead. Frodo barely reached the ford ahead of his foes and crossed it. Reaching the other bank he looked back, in fear that he would be caught if they crossed but also being compelled by the power of the Nazgûl.
“There were Nine Riders at the water's edge below... Suddenly the foremost Rider spurred his horse forward. It checked at the water and reared up.” – The Fellowship of the Ring; I; XII onwards Though weak from a wraith-cut Frodo drew his sword and ordered them to leave, but had not the power to intimidate them (image from The Lord of the Rings, 1978).
“`The Ring! The Ring!' they cried with deadly voices; and immediately their leader urged his horse forward into the water, followed closely by two others.” The foremost of the black horses had almost set foot upon the eastern bank when the river was unleashed by Elrond, Lord of Rivendell (art by Denis Gordeev);
The power of Elrond was enhanced by Gandalf the Wizard, seen in how the foams took the form of riders on horses with frothing manes (art by Eric Velhagen). “The three Riders that were still in the midst of the Ford were overwhelmed: they disappeared, buried suddenly under angry foam. Those that were behind drew back in dismay.”
“With his last failing senses Frodo heard cries, and it seemed to him that he saw, beyond the Riders that hesitated on the shore, a shining figure of white light; and behind it ran small shadowy forms waving flames, that flared red in the grey mist that was falling over the world” (art by Ted Nasmith).
“The black horses were filled with madness, and leaping forward in terror they bore their riders into the rushing flood. Their piercing cries were drowned in the roaring of the river as it carried them away” (art by Gellihana-art).
Ringwraiths presumably could be harmed by fire, and at any rate “do not love it, and fear those who wield it” (FotR; I; XI); why on the western shore Aragorn, Glorfindel, and the remaining hobbits had armed themselves with burning branches. Glorfindel meanwhile shone with a fair light seen by those who beheld the world of spirits and wraiths. This was also seen by Frodo, presumably due to his accursed wound that was in progress to turn him into a wraith (art by AlystraeaArt).
The Wizard Gandalf later explained about the Nazgûl that caught “between fire and water, and seeing an Elf-lord revealed in his wrath, they were dismayed, and their horses were stricken with madness” (FotR; II; I, art by Sebastian Giacobino). Glorfindel shone because he was one of the few lingering “lords of the Eldar from beyond the furthest seas. They do not fear the Ringwraiths, for those who have dwelt in the Blessed Realm live at once in both worlds, and against both the Seen and the Unseen they have great power.”
JRR wrote that while dreadful the Nazgûl had disadvantages; “All except the Witch-king were apt to stray when alone by daylight; and all, again save the Witch-king, feared water and were unwilling, except in dire need, to enter it or to cross streams unless dryshod by a bridge” (Unfinished Tales; III; IV; ii). On this he added a note: “At the Ford of Bruinen only the Witch-king and two others, with the lure of the Ring straight before them, had dared to enter the river; the others were driven into it by Glorfindel and Aragorn.” – UT; III; IV; Note 3 (art by Ted Nasmith)
On all presented until now Christopher Tolkien, confidant of his father and foremost caretaker of and scholar on his legacy, commented (Unfinished Tales; III; IV; ii): “My father nowhere explained the Ringwraiths' fear of water. In the account just cited it is made a chief motive in Sauron's assault on Osgiliath, and it reappears in detailed notes on the movement of the Black Riders in the Shire...” These four Riders, for the record, did not include the Witch-king personally.
Of Khamûl, seen on the far side of Bucklebury Ferry, “it is said that ’he was well aware that the Ring had crossed the river; but the river was a barrier to his sense of its movement’, and that the Nazgûl would not touch the ’Elvish’ waters of Baranduin. But it is not made clear how they crossed other rivers that lay in their path, such as the Greyflood, where there was only ’a dangerous ford formed by the ruins of the bridge’.... My father did indeed note that the idea was difficult to sustain.”
With the Witch-king present to lead them, how the rest crossed Isen and Greyflood can be understood. But what of them trying to cross waters without him, at the time and throughout the Second and Third Ages, as must have occured? And how could four cross the Baranduin if they would not touch its so called ’Elvish’ waters? Note: leaving the Shire they used a bridge (art by Aleksander Zaborowski).
We do not know why Baranduin was ’Elvish’ or what that entails. It could been a temporary idea of JRR since - to my knowledge - this is not elsewhere reaffirmed. Assuming that it was not a temporary concept, in case [though nowhere stated] also Bruinen at Rivendell was ’Elvish’ a solution to mitigate the difficulty of the idea could be found: the Witch-king lead his peers into Bruinen, and if so with him present apparently no water is impassable. Though the absence of the Ring at other places than the Bruinen is a serious challenge to this solution (photo by Heather Cuthill).
Why was water feared by Ringwraiths, that required the influence of their leader to overcome? For this post I pursued a thesis of my own that the issue was that water distorted their capacity to perceive the world [figuratively blinding them]. Nazgûl “do not see the world of light as we do, but our shapes cast shadows in their minds, which only the noon sun destroys; and in the dark they perceive many signs and forms that are hidden from us: then they are most to be feared” (FotR; I; XI).
“And at all times they smell the blood of living things, desiring and hating it. Senses, too, there are other than sight or smell. We can feel their presence - it troubled our hearts, as soon as we came here, and before we saw them; they feel ours more keenly. Also... the Ring draws them” (ibid, art by Anato Finnstark). JRR wrote that “[Khamûl] [is] the most ready of all (save [the Witch-king]) to perceive the presence of the Ring, but also the one whose power was most confused and diminished by sunlight” (A Readers Companion; LotR; §75).
Still, as told, at the Ferry at night Khamûl knew that “the Ring had crossed the river; but the river was a barrier to his sense of its movement” (ARC; LotR; §99) Not that the ability to perceive the presence of the Ring was precise, at best it gave a general direction or a sense where the One had been (ARC; LotR; §75 + §99+ §176), still it had me suspect that water barred senses (art by DiegoGisbertLlorens).
Against the thesis is the plausible argument that it may been only the Branaduin that had this effect due to an ’Elvish’ element; also from same source is that Frodo spent a night in the company of Elves, and about Khamûl it is then noted: “While Frodo is surrounded by the Elves he cannot perceive the Ring clearly.” – LotR: ARC; FotR; III; 78 (art by steamy)
Ifound no clear support for my thesis so I refer to that JRR nowhere explained the Ringwraiths' fear of water (art by John Hodgeson @jonnyhodgsonart). Nevertheless, evil creatures being at odds with water is not specific to the Nazgûl but a well-established fact in the legendarium since the Elder Days. Thus we turn to two mighty demiurges: Ulmo and Morgoth.
In the Elder Days the world was formed and governed by the godlike Valar. Great among the Valar was Ulmo, the Lord of Waters, who moves “in all the deep waters about the Earth or under the Earth” (The Silmarillion; II, art by Jakub Rozalski). Ulmo invoked dread but he “loves both Elves and Men, and never abandoned them.... all seas, lakes, rivers, fountains and springs are in his government; so that the Elves say that the spirit of Ulmo runs in all the veins of the world.”
The original Dark Lord, Morgoth, was Vala who fell to evil. In the Elder Days Morgoth occupied Middle-earth for a time but even then Ulmo never forsook it “and whatsoever may since have befallen of ruin or of change he has not ceased to take thought for it, and will not until the end of days” (art by Dymond Starr).
Long ago Morgoth lured into his service spirits which he corrupted, like the Balrogs and Sauron. Later he twisted living creatures into Orcs, trolls, dragons and so on. In their wars with him the Eldar built defensive towers at the coast “though needlessly, as it proved; for at no time ever did Morgoth essay to build ships or to make war by sea. Water all his servants shunned, and to the sea none would willingly go nigh, save in dire need” (Silm; III; XIV, art by Jovan Delic).
There are many examples of rivers having protective attributes when “the power of Ulmo was in that water” (Silm; III; XVIII). Though not specified how there are cases when rivers caused mist to cover folk from enemies. Also lakes Ulmo is known to have “guarded from defilement” though direct acts against them could still ruin them (Silm; III; XXI, art by Stefan Meisl).
In order to control Earth and his own servants Morgoth infused the physical matter of the world with his own essence, or power. “But in this way Morgoth lost (or exchanged, or transmuted) the greater part of his original 'angelic' powers, of mind and spirit, while gaining a terrible grip upon the physical world.... Morgoth's vast power was disseminated. The whole of 'Middle-earth' was Morgoth's Ring, though temporarily his attention was mainly upon the North-west.” – The History of Middle-earth 10; V; VII; ii onwards (art by formenost)
“It is quite possible, of course, that certain 'elements' or conditions of matter had attracted Morgoth's special attention (mainly, unless in the remote past, for reasons of his own plans). For example, all gold (in Middle-earth) seems to have had a specially 'evil' trend - but not silver. Water is represented as being almost entirely free of Morgoth. (This, of course, does not mean that any particular sea, stream, river, well, or even vessel of water could not be poisoned or defiled - as all things could.)”
So, whatever were the specifics for the Nazgûl, they existed in a long tradition of evil creatures shunning water, possibly daunted by it being the domain of Ulmo, and perhaps because it was among the matter on Earth least tainted by the evil of Morgoth. But most ambiguity is not a fault but a feature, as for all detailed world building in essence the legendarium of Tolkien is not a manual but a mythology.
Some related accounts: Nazgûl https://imgur.com/gallery/SeJqQAD Ulmo https://imgur.com/gallery/ulmo-aYtRJvC Morgoth's Ring https://imgur.com/gallery/evRdAfA — — — — — Index: character bios https://imgur.com/gallery/axV2mPF Index: folks, animals, items, etc https://imgur.com/gallery/AQK9pJL
item.dc:creator: Ngugi

item.title: Dump of allsort things that may be interesting.
item.description:
Christmas market in Romania opened Saturday.
Home made truck.
Runway painting and without the lights.
This is just heart melting.
Some Vintage Lighters.
Flat chalk silhouette art.
Car headlight comparison.
Japanese people are geniuses.
Releasing surplus water from a hydroelectric power plant in Brazil.
Off The Grid Clothes Washing. Yes that's too much soap indeed.
Cutting the cheese.
Dropping the excavator from the truck.
Evenly fills six shot glasses instantly for fun.
A T-Cell destroying a ovarian cancer cell.
Amazing penmanship.

item.title: Some tips to stay safe from AI scams
item.description:
Corridor Crew did a great job buying online AI scams, to show examples and what to keep an eye out for. Stained glass products are a large source of AI scams.
Something labeled with prestigious brand names, materials, for thrift store prices is a red flag.
Look at the reviews. Obvious AI reviews are obvious. Homogeneity is a red flag, same sentence structure, same buzzwords, same structures. Always a 5star rating.
Advertisement images also are becoming AI generated. It costs more money to invest in an actual subject, pay a photographer to do good lighting and upload it. AI can do it even cheaper. Looking for AI errors in the ads can also be a telltale sign.
Printing AI images is cheaper than underpaying sweatshops.
Color palette swaps are faster with AI (or even old school Photoshop). Look for reviewers posting their received products.
Even advertisements about human connection, emotion, celebration are being robbed of artistic soul to save a few bucks. AI as an ability assist, artistic tool, is very different than advertisements, data theft, propaganda.
Massive discounts and bargains are a classic underhanded sales technique. Anything saying 99% limited time offer, exclusive discount, probably are after things more valuable than the payment. Personal info, card numbers, demographic data.
The cost of all of this is diligence. Find resources to learn how to spot AI images, videos, news, comments, reviews, scams. Full Corridor Crew vid here https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=nanCGeac_-Q&pp=ygUiY29ycmlkb3IgQ3JldyBzbyB5b3UgZG9uJ3QgaGF2ZSB0bw%3D%3D Lots more funny tryons, silly AI mistakes. Here are just the tools to keep in mind for this holiday season, and the future.
